name: TRIGGERED_SEND
description: Table containing information about triggered sends.

columns.name: auto_add_subscribers
columns.description: Flag indicating if subscribers are automatically added

columns.name: auto_update_subscribers
columns.description: Flag indicating if subscribers are automatically updated

columns.name: created_date
columns.description: Date when the triggered send was created

columns.name: modified_date
columns.description: Date when the triggered send was last modified

columns.name: email_subject
columns.description: Email subject of the triggered send

columns.name: from_address
columns.description: From address of the triggered send

columns.name: from_name
columns.description: From name of the triggered send

columns.name: is_multipart
columns.description: Flag indicating if the email is multipart

columns.name: is_wrapped
columns.description: Flag indicating if the email is wrapped

columns.name: send_limit
columns.description: Send limit of the triggered send
